title: Why UFOs are back
description:
Later this month, Congress is expecting to receive a long-awaited report from the Pentagon revealing their investigations into unidentified flying objects. But there’s also been a handful of examples of pretty compelling video footage captured by the US Navy that’s behind this current wave of interest in UFOs. Vox’s Dylan Matthews explains
References: 

Read Dylan’s story here: https://www.vox.com/22463659/ufo-videos-navy-alien-drone

https://www.nytimes.com/2017/12/16/us/politics/pentagon-program-ufo-harry-reid.html

Later this month, Congress is expecting to receive a long-awaited report from the Pentagon revealing their investigations into unidentified flying objects. But there’s also been a handful of examples of pretty compelling video footage captured by the US Navy that’s behind this current wave of interest in UFOs. Vox’s Dylan Matthews explains
